explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of machine learning techniques, specifically recurrent reinforcement learning, for portfolio optimization.
explanations.reinforcement learning: The paper focuses on recurrent reinforcement learning (RRL) techniques to optimize asset trading systems.
explanations.deep learning: The proposed Stacked Deep Dynamic Recurrent Reinforcement Learning (SDDRRL) architecture involves deep learning methods.
explanations.neural network: The SDDRRL architecture is a type of neural network designed for continuous control in portfolio optimization.
explanations.recurrent neural network: The paper mentions recurrent reinforcement learning, which involves recurrent neural networks (RNNs) for handling sequential data.
explanations.long short-term memory: Although not explicitly mentioned, LSTM networks are a common type of RNN used in reinforcement learning for sequential data, which might be implied in the SDDRRL architecture.
explanations.LSTM: Similar to long short-term memory, LSTM networks are likely part of the recurrent neural network architecture used in the proposed method.
